documents.document: @annikakes I know right, slipped one in my bag for afternoon tea. Really enjoyed it. We're so lucky in Welly aren't we....
Sixes and Sevens rock. I'm coming back for you pear brioche... #sixesandsevens #fresh #local #beautbaking https://t.co/e4z3VXG3D3
